TopicTitle: Image retention appeared out of nowhere

Articles.Content: I started KSP one day and noticed that I get some kind of image retention or image persistence in a few scenes. While it doesn't happen in the VAB or the SPH, it does happen in flight, in the main menu and I get something that looks like burn-in in the loading screens. And the thing is, it just happened and I don't know why. I have a list of my mods right here, I'm playing on v1.8.1. The .log file is here as well. If there are any further questions, just ask me because I don't really know what's needed other than the .log file.
